verses.verse: They <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3322>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for <S%H7126>it:<s%> and they offered burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

When <S%H1732>David<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5927>offering<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He <S%H2505>dealt<s%> to <S%H376>everyone<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> to every <S%H376>one<s%> a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and a portion of <S%H829>meat,<s%> and a cake of <S%H809>raisins.<s%>

He <S%H5414>appointed<s%> certain of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and to <S%H2142>celebrate<s%> and to <S%H3034>thank<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

<S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> and <S%H4932>second<s%> to him <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> and <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and <S%H5654>Obed-Edom,<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> with stringed <S%H5035>instruments<s%> and with <S%H3658>harps;<s%> and <S%H623>Asaph<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> sounding <S%H8085>aloud;<s%>

and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> and <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7218>first<s%> <S%H5414>ordained<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
Oh give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> on his <S%H8034>name.<s%> Make his <S%H5949>doings<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H2167>him.<s%> Sing praises to <S%H7878>him.<s%> Tell of all his marvelous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
<S%H1984>Glory<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%> Let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%>
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and his <S%H5797>strength.<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> forever <S%H8548>more.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> his <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> works that he has <S%H6213>done,<s%> his <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%>
you <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> you <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> his chosen <S%H972>ones.<s%>
He is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%> His <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations,<s%>
the covenant which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> his <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>
He <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> the same to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>statute,<s%> and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>
<S%H559>saying,<s%> "I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> The <S%H2256>lot<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%>"
when you were but a <S%H4557>few<s%> men in <S%H4592>number,<s%> yes, very few, and foreigners were in <S%H1481>it.<s%>
They <S%H1980>went<s%> about from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H1471>nation,<s%> from one <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>
He <S%H3240>allowed<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> to do them <S%H6231>wrong.<s%> <S%H3198>Yes,<s%> he reproved kings for their <S%H4428>sakes,<s%>
<S%H5060>"Don't<s%> touch my <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H5030>ones!<s%> Do my prophets no <S%H7489>harm!<s%>"
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all the <S%H776>earth!<s%> <S%H1319>Display<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H5608>Declare<s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and his marvelous <S%H6381>works<s%> among all the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised.<s%> He also is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> above all <S%H430>gods.<s%>
For all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H457>idols,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
<S%H1935>Honor<s%> and <S%H1935>majesty<s%> are before <S%H6440>him.<s%> <S%H5797>Strength<s%> and <S%H2304>gladness<s%> are in his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H4940>relatives<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> <S%H3051>ascribe<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength!<s%>

<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> due to his <S%H8034>name.<s%> <S%H5375>Bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7812>him.<s%> Worship <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1927>array.<s%>
<S%H2342>Tremble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H776>him,<s%> all the earth. The <S%H8398>world<s%> also is <S%H3559>established<s%> that it <S%H4131>can't<s%> be moved.

Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice!<s%> Let them <S%H559>say<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H4427>reigns!<s%>"
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar,<s%> and its <S%H4393>fullness!<s%> Let the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5970>exult,<s%> and all that is therein!
Then the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> will sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Oh give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good,<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

<S%H559>Say,<s%> <S%H3467>"Save<s%> <S%H430>us,<s%> God of our <S%H3468>salvation!<s%> Gather us <S%H6908>together<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us from the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H7623>triumph<s%> in your <S%H8416>praise.<s%>"

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> even to <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%> All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen,<s%>" and <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

So he <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H6440>there,<s%> before the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> as every <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1697>work<s%> <S%H3117>required;<s%>

and <S%H5654>Obed-Edom<s%> with their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H8083>eight;<s%> <S%H5654>Obed-Edom<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> and <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> to be <S%H7778>doorkeepers;<s%>

and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the high <S%H1116>place<s%> that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%>

to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening,<s%> even according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and with them <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and the <S%H7605>rest<s%> who were <S%H1305>chosen,<s%> who were <S%H5344>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>

and with them <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> for those that should <S%H8085>sound<s%> <S%H3627>aloud,<s%> and with instruments for the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> to be at the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5437>returned<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%>
